pages.text: $(li)Nether Wart is a useful item that can be found in the Nether Fortress of the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can plant it in Soul Sand and make it grows up faster applying Bone Meal of it.

$(li)This item can be used to craft Crimson Wart Blocks, Red Nether Bricks, Seed Pouch and Nether Wart Sack in a Crafting Table.$(br)$(li)You can use this item as ingredient to brew a Awkward Potion in a Brewing Stand.$(br)$(li)Clerics will change your Nether Wart by Emeralds too.
